# Historical Document Gallery

This gallery presents the complete collection of historical documents related to 1822 Pine Street, organized chronologically. Each document has been digitized at high resolution and is available for detailed examination.

```{python}
#| echo: false
import json
import os
from pathlib import Path

# Load metadata
metadata_dir = Path("../metadata")
if metadata_dir.exists():
    # Load processing results
    results_file = metadata_dir / "processing_results.json"
    if results_file.exists():
        with open(results_file) as f:
            results = json.load(f)
            
        # Group documents by type and decade
        deeds = []
        clippings_by_decade = {}
        
        for doc in results.get('processed', []):
            if doc['type'] == 'deed':
                deeds.append(doc)
            else:
                if doc.get('extracted_date'):
                    year = int(doc['extracted_date'][:4])
                    decade = f"{(year // 10) * 10}s"
                    if decade not in clippings_by_decade:
                        clippings_by_decade[decade] = []
                    clippings_by_decade[decade].append(doc)
```

## Property Deeds

Legal documents establishing ownership and transfer of 1822 Pine Street.

::: {.document-gallery}
```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
if 'deeds' in locals():
    for deed in sorted(deeds, key=lambda x: x.get('extracted_date', '')):
        if deed.get('images'):
            web_image = deed['images'][0]['web']
            date = deed.get('extracted_date', 'Undated')
            print(f'''
<div class="gallery-item">
  <img src="../{web_image}" alt="{deed['filename']}" class="document-image">
  <div class="gallery-item-title">Property Deed</div>
  <div class="gallery-item-date">{date}</div>
</div>
''')
```
:::

### 1920s-1950s

::: {.document-gallery}
```{python}
#| echo: false
```
